REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0653 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 04-03 0039

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT FURTHER REVISED UPWARD
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has revised its estimate of today's shortfall to 800 mln stg from 750 mln, before taking account of 170 mln stg morning assistance. REUTER
